      • toVector

        public static REXP toVector(Object array)
        Convert array object to REXPVector, or REXPNull if null.
        Parameters:
        array - object that is null or an array
        Returns:
        if object is null, returns REXPNull, otherwise if object is a primitive array returns an REXPVector, otherwise throws an IllegalArgumentException.
